title: Children's play centres
creator_credit: State Film Centre of Victoria and National Fitness Council of Victoria
brief_description: During the Christmas holidays many Melbourne children are entertained and cared for at play centres, established by local authorities in association with the National Fitness Council. Short sequences show the youngsters taking part in various games under the guidance of trained leaders.
